name: SuperNanny
0:
”Alexa, open super nanny and give me a fun activity”
”what should we do today”
”can you tell me something to do with the kids”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super nanny
des:
Super Nanny helps you find fun activities that will keep your kids busy all afternoon.

If you’re running out of ideas, just ask Super Nanny! 
She will give you new suggestions every week, inspired by the world’s best super-parents.

Super Nanny thinks it’s important to keep the kids off the screens. That’s why she suggests activities around sport, creativity, music, science and imagination. 

All ideas come with an instruction card that you can view on the Alexa App for more information and tips on how to make these moments even more fun!

Go meet Super Nanny and let us know which activity your kids preferred in the customer review!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
